title: HOUR 1: The Mavs Punch Back
itunes:title: HOUR 1: The Mavs Punch Back
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Jason McIntyre react to the Clippers falling to the Mavericks in Game 2 of their opening round series and question how great Luka Doncic can be. The guys debate which L.A. team is in more trouble and explain why it’s time to split up the Sixers! Plus, they find an answer for why the NBA’s ratings have declined!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
